name: Kerr
data: \frac{a^2 r \sin (\vartheta ) \cos (\vartheta ) r_s \left(r_s \left(a^2 (r-1) \sin ^2(\vartheta )+r \Sigma \right)-h \Sigma \right)}{\Sigma  r_s \left(a^2 \Sigma  \sin ^2(\vartheta )+a^2 (r-1) r \sin ^2(\vartheta ) r_s-h r \Sigma \right)+h \Sigma ^3}

\frac{a \sin ^2(\vartheta ) r_s \left(a^2 h \cos ^2(\vartheta )+a^2 \sin ^2(\vartheta ) r_s+r^2 (-(h+2 \Sigma ))\right)}{2 \left(r_s \left(a^2 \Sigma  \sin ^2(\vartheta )+a^2 (r-1) r \sin ^2(\vartheta ) r_s-h r \Sigma \right)+h \Sigma ^2\right)}

\frac{a^2 r \sin (\vartheta ) \cos (\vartheta ) r_s \left(r_s \left(a^2 (r-1) \sin ^2(\vartheta )+r \Sigma \right)-h \Sigma \right)}{\Sigma  r_s \left(a^2 \Sigma  \sin ^2(\vartheta )+a^2 (r-1) r \sin ^2(\vartheta ) r_s-h r \Sigma \right)+h \Sigma ^3}

\frac{a \sin ^2(\vartheta ) r_s \left(a^2 h \cos ^2(\vartheta )+a^2 \sin ^2(\vartheta ) r_s+r^2 (-(h+2 \Sigma ))\right)}{2 \left(r_s \left(a^2 \Sigma  \sin ^2(\vartheta )+a^2 (r-1) r \sin ^2(\vartheta ) r_s-h r \Sigma \right)+h \Sigma ^2\right)}
-\frac{a r \cot (\vartheta ) r_s \left(a^2+\csc ^2(\vartheta ) \left(\Sigma -r r_s\right)\right)}{a^2 r_s \left((r-1) r r_s+\Sigma \right)+h \Sigma  \csc ^2(\vartheta ) \left(\Sigma -r r_s\right)}

\frac{r \left(-4 \Sigma  r_s \left(a^2 \sin ^2(\vartheta )+r \Sigma \right)+a^2 \sin ^2(\vartheta ) r_s^2 \left(a^2 \cos (2 \vartheta )+a^2-2 (r-2) r\right)+4 \Sigma ^3\right)}{4 \left(\Sigma  r_s \left(a^2 \Sigma  \sin ^2(\vartheta )+a^2 (r-1) r \sin ^2(\vartheta ) r_s-h r \Sigma \right)+h \Sigma ^3\right)}
-\frac{a r \cot (\vartheta ) r_s \left(a^2+\csc ^2(\vartheta ) \left(\Sigma -r r_s\right)\right)}{a^2 r_s \left((r-1) r r_s+\Sigma \right)+h \Sigma  \csc ^2(\vartheta ) \left(\Sigma -r r_s\right)}

\frac{a^2 r \sin (2 \vartheta ) r_s^2 \left(a^2 (r-1) \sin ^2(\vartheta )+(r-2) \Sigma \right)+2 \Sigma  r_s \left(a^4 \sin ^3(\vartheta ) \cos (\vartheta )+a^2 \Sigma  \sin (2 \vartheta )-h r \Sigma  \cot (\vartheta )\right)+2 h \Sigma ^3 \cot (\vartheta )}{2 \left(\Sigma  r_s \left(a^2 \Sigma  \sin ^2(\vartheta )+a^2 (r-1) r \sin ^2(\vartheta ) r_s-h r \Sigma \right)+h \Sigma ^3\right)}

\frac{r \left(-4 \Sigma  r_s \left(a^2 \sin ^2(\vartheta )+r \Sigma \right)+a^2 \sin ^2(\vartheta ) r_s^2 \left(a^2 \cos (2 \vartheta )+a^2-2 (r-2) r\right)+4 \Sigma ^3\right)}{4 \left(\Sigma  r_s \left(a^2 \Sigma  \sin ^2(\vartheta )+a^2 (r-1) r \sin ^2(\vartheta ) r_s-h r \Sigma \right)+h \Sigma ^3\right)}

\frac{a^2 r \sin (2 \vartheta ) r_s^2 \left(a^2 (r-1) \sin ^2(\vartheta )+(r-2) \Sigma \right)+2 \Sigma  r_s \left(a^4 \sin ^3(\vartheta ) \cos (\vartheta )+a^2 \Sigma  \sin (2 \vartheta )-h r \Sigma  \cot (\vartheta )\right)+2 h \Sigma ^3 \cot (\vartheta )}{2 \left(\Sigma  r_s \left(a^2 \Sigma  \sin ^2(\vartheta )+a^2 (r-1) r \sin ^2(\vartheta ) r_s-h r \Sigma \right)+h \Sigma ^3\right)}
